name: RoombaTaxi
description:
This is quite the dumb game where you play as a Roomba that tries to ferry a cat over to its destination before the time runs out.

Worked for 2:55:15 on this game with >30 mins title screen art from a friend

Controls: A&D to move left and right

(Made for Trijam #183)

also, I missed the submission deadline :(
